title: Clean up mention of trie fields in documentation and source comments
description: Mention of trie fields should be removed where feasible from docs and source comments.

comments.content: Patch, found by looking for t{date,long,int,float,double} and "Trie".  Committing shortly.
comments.author: Steve Rowe
